cause.description:
Not-for-profit food distribution center providing food for hungry people while striving to end hunger in our community. Also provides food for Hurricane Katrina evacuees in Cook County.
1. Provide food to the hungry.
2. Provide the tools to help people break the cycle of poverty.
3. Reduce food waste.
cause.mission: provide food for hungry people while striving to end hunger altogether.
cause.name: Greater Chicago Food Depository
